abstract: Mun In-Guk (Chosŏn'gŭl: 문인국; Hanja:文人國; born September 29, 1978) is a North Korean international football player.Mun has made 22 appearances for the Korea DPR national football team in FIFA World Cup qualifying rounds.
comment: Mun In-Guk (Chosŏn'gŭl: 문인국; Hanja:文人國; born September 29, 1978) is a North Korean international football player.Mun has made 22 appearances for the Korea DPR national football team in FIFA World Cup qualifying rounds.
